description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Keyword Search page in the web interface in Pattern Insight 2.3 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via crafted characters that are not properly handled during construction of error messages.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-4950

description: Multiple SQL injection vulnerabilities in terminal/paramedit.aspx in VeriFone VeriCentre Web Console before 2.2 build 36 allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the (1) TerminalId, (2) ModelName, or (3) ApplicationName parameter.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-4951

description: The decomposer engine in Symantec Endpoint Protection (SEP) 11.0, Symantec Endpoint Protection Small Business Edition 12.0, Symantec AntiVirus Corporate Edition (SAVCE) 10.x, and Symantec Scan Engine (SSE) before 5.2.8 does not properly perform bounds checks of the contents of CAB archives, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code via a crafted file.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-4953

description: The edit-profile page in Vanilla Forums before 2.1a32 allows remote authenticated users to modify arbitrary profile settings by replacing the UserID value during a man-in-the-middle attack, related to a "parameter manipulation" issue.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-4954

description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Dell OpenManage Server Administrator (OMSA) before 6.5.0.1, 7.0 before 7.0.0.1, and 7.1 before 7.1.0.1 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-4955

description: Heap-based buffer overflow in NFRAgent.exe in Novell File Reporter 1.0.2 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a large number of VOL elements in an SRS record.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-4956

description: Absolute path traversal vulnerability in NFRAgent.exe in Novell File Reporter 1.0.2 allows remote attackers to read arbitrary files via a /FSF/CMD request with a full pathname in a PATH element of an SRS record.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-4957

description: Directory traversal vulnerability in NFRAgent.exe in Novell File Reporter 1.0.2 allows remote attackers to read arbitrary files via a 126 /FSF/CMD request with a .. (dot dot) in a FILE element of an FSFUI record.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-4958

description: Directory traversal vulnerability in NFRAgent.exe in Novell File Reporter 1.0.2 allows remote attackers to upload and execute files via a 130 /FSF/CMD request with a .. (dot dot) in a FILE element of an FSFUI record.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-4959

description: The Samsung printer firmware before 20121031 has a hardcoded read-write SNMP community, which makes it easier for remote attackers to obtain administrative access via an SNMP request.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-4964

description: Google Chrome before 23.0.1271.64 on Mac OS X does not properly mitigate improper write behavior in graphics drivers, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service or possibly have unspecified other impact via unknown vectors that trigger "wild writes."

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-5115

description: Use-after-free vulnerability in Google Chrome before 23.0.1271.64 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service or possibly have unspecified other impact via vectors related to the handling of SVG filters.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-5116

description: Google Chrome before 23.0.1271.64 does not properly restrict the loading of an SVG subresource in the context of an IMG element, which has unspecified impact and remote attack vectors.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-5117

description: Google Chrome before 23.0.1271.64 on Mac OS X does not properly validate an integer value during the handling of GPU command buffers, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service or possibly have unspecified other impact via unknown vectors.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-5118

description: Race condition in Pepper, as used in Google Chrome before 23.0.1271.64, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service or possibly have unspecified other impact via vectors related to buffers.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2012-5119
